author: bayard
msg: Switching the Logger to use the constructor parameter PrintStream instead of a hardcoded System.out. Also protected the only use of mOut in Logger from a null mOut. It would be a better API to throw an NPE if one is passed in, but that would affect backwards compat.

author: eli
msg: HDFS-811. Add metrics, failure reporting and additional tests for HDFS-457. Contributed by Eli Collins.

author: sabob
msg: improved MockContext to cleanup lingering ThreadLocals of the Mock stack
